Jadwalkan Konsultasi

About Me

A Multifaceted Designer And Developer With A Knack For
Blending Creativity & Technical Precision.

UI/UX Design

Creating intuitive and engaging user interfaces.

Web Development

Building responsive and fast websites.

Prototyping

Bringing ideas to life with interactive mockups.

Branding

Developing strong and memorable brand identities.

Lead Designer at Creative Inc. (2022 - Present)

Leading a team of designers to create stunning visuals for various clients across the globe.

Web Developer at Tech Solutions (2020 - 2022)

Developed and maintained client websites, focusing on performance, accessibility, and modern web standards.

Beyond the screen, I find inspiration in street photography, exploring new cultures through travel, and experimenting with minimalist graphic art. These hobbies fuel my creativity and bring a fresh perspective to my professional work.

Siap untuk lebih produktif?

Mari diskusikan bagaimana saya bisa membantu meringankan beban kerja Anda.
